group_1.textLeft: Ahem...
Thank you for coming, everyone!
Just to recap,
we're here to do a project at the charity bazaar
where we hand out homemade@chocolates to children!

group_1.textRight: We'll collect donations from adults and@give them to welfare organizations.
Indeed.
I'm glad you came up with a@good plan for Valentine's Day.
The organizer for the bazaar was also very pleased.

group_1.textLeft: Thank you for letting me consult@with you about the stall!

group_1.textRight: I've run shops before,@so I'm glad my experience could help.
It's also a pleasure to promote@local projects such as this one.

group_1.textLeft: I have to thank you, too, Manaka!
There were so many things I had no clue about,@so it was really helpful to hear about them.

group_1.textRight: Right. There are a lot of regulations involved in@selling homemade food, but all that’s part of my job.
And like they say, everyone knows their@own business best― so leave it to me!

group_1.textLeft: Thank you!

group_1.textRight: So...how will we set up the stall@when the big day comes?

group_1.textLeft: Walnut's will have a shop at the bazaar@where we'll be selling our goods!
Manaka's father also approved of our idea,
so he'll let us decorate the booth.
I asked Konomi to help us with that,@so she'll be in charge of the decorations.

group_1.textRight: I'll do my best to coordinate the decor
to really suit the Valentine's Day theme!

group_1.textLeft: You know, if Konomi is@decorating the Walnut's booth,
why don't we work with Blossom's@and make it a joint shop?

group_1.textRight: So, like, a collaboration...?!

group_1.textLeft: We'd be all for that!

group_1.textRight: I'd love to...[chara:303050:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:303050:cheek_0][chara:303050:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json:motion_301][chara:303050:lipSynch_1]but wait!@Let's hold off until I can speak with the owner.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, right, you should do that...

group_1.textRight: But I'm positive she'll be happy to do it.

group_1.textLeft: In that case, welcome aboard, Konomi!

group_1.textRight: Yeah! I'll be happy to help!

group_1.textLeft: Alright, then...on the day of the bazaar,@all five of us will help sell chocolate.
Let’s see, what else do we need to decide...
Right, we'll need someone to make the chocolate,@and someone in charge of promotion.

group_1.textRight: I think you should be the one@making the chocolates.
You're the one who came up with this idea, after all.

group_1.textLeft: Y-yeah...that's true...
But the chocolates have to be homemade...@And I'm not sure if mine will sell.

group_1.textRight: These products will be distributed@under the Walnut's brand,
so I'll ensure it's all up to our standards.
You've got nothing to worry about!

group_1.textLeft: Alright, thank you...!
Hey, would it be okay if you helped me too, Masara?
All of those chocolates might@be too much for me alone.

group_1.textRight: Sure, whatever works for you.

group_1.textLeft: Thank you! I'm really looking forward to this!

group_1.textRight: Asuka and I will help advertise the shop!

group_1.textLeft: Please do! That'd be great.

group_1.textRight: ...Speaking of advertising,
did you invite Himika to the bazaar, Kokoro?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, I did!
When I went to see Kanagi for her advice,
along the way, I let Himika know about the shop.

group_1.textRight: Good.

group_1.textLeft: Hmm...@We need to make a lot of flyers to promote this.

group_1.textRight: We can't make them here, though―@Let's find a place where we can.

group_1.textLeft: Perhaps our dojo?
We can make the flyers, and Konomi can@prepare the decorations there as well!
Meanwhile, Kokoro and Masara@can make the chocolate at Walnut's!
So we'll split into two groups, then.
Is there anything you'd like to do, Kanagi?

group_1.textRight: I have a part-time job, so unfortunately,@I can't assist you.
But if you have any questions about running@the store, please don't hesitate to ask.

group_1.textLeft: Will do! Thank you very much.
